title: New mechanism of action found for agricultural pesticide fludioxonil

title_detail.value: New mechanism of action found for agricultural pesticide fludioxonil

summary: A fungicide commonly used by the agricultural industry to protect grains, fruit and vegetables from mold damage seems to kill fungi by a previously uncharacterized mechanism that delivers a metabolic shock to cells.

summary_detail.value: A fungicide commonly used by the agricultural industry to protect grains, fruit and vegetables from mold damage seems to kill fungi by a previously uncharacterized mechanism that delivers a metabolic shock to cells.
